Body:
"""
    Check that the KL divergence matches a 1D by-hand calculation.
    """
mu1d = Datum.mu[(dim), :][(None), :]
s1d = Datum.sqrt[:, (dim), (dim)][:, (None), (None)]
K1d = Datum.K_batch[:, (dim), (dim)][:, (None), (None)]
kl = gauss_kl(mu1d, s1d, K1d if not white else None)
kl_1d = compute_kl_1d(tf.reshape(mu1d, (-1,)), tf.reshape(s1d, (-1,)), None if
    white else tf.reshape(K1d, (-1,)))
np.testing.assert_allclose(kl, kl_1d)
pytest.mark.parametrize('dim', [0, 1])pytest.mark.parametrize('white', [True, False])
